ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC!
Critically acclaimed COPPERHEAD returns with new artist DREW MOSS! Sheriff Clara Bronson's past and present collide as an old friend arrives in town while Clara investigates the murder of Copperhead's mayor. Find out why BRIAN K. VAUGHAN called this his "favorite new comic."
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-04 23:37:16. [Issue ID 585099]
